name: Hans Petersson
content: Hans Petersson (24 September 1902 in Bentschen – 9 November 1984 in Münster) was a German mathematician. He introduced the Petersson inner product and is also known for the Ramanujan–Petersson conjecture.
tags: People from the Province of Posen
raw:
For those of a similar name, see Hans Peterson and Hans Petersen (disambiguation).
Hans Petersson (24 September 1902 in Bentschen – 9 November 1984 in Münster) was a German mathematician. He introduced the Petersson inner product and is also known for the Ramanujan–Petersson conjecture.

See also[edit]
Weil–Petersson metric
